directions.step:
Peel, core & quarter apples & place in shallow baking dish. Dot with butter & sprinkle brown sugar over top. Cover & bake at 325 for 20 minutes. Pour cream over apples. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes or until soft.
DOROTHY MATHEWS
From <Simply Southern>, the Desoto School Mothers' Assn, Helena-West Helena, AR 72390. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
